products.title: Splash Mocha Brown 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Splash mocha brown 89mm vertical blind in brown. Made to measure from 9.70 with free uk mainland delivery. This 89mm vertical blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
A family favourite, their splash range comes in a wide variety of colours and blinds. Splash mocha brown is a chic medium brown vertical blind - perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out vertical blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this brown vertical blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant!Our quality made to measure vertical blinds are a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. Whether its fully closed, binge-watching the latest riveting tv drama, or letting the light in (but keeping your privacy), their vertical blinds are great for privacy and light control.Coming with sleek white components and quality-checked by their blind experts, quality is paramount. At swift direct blinds with over 50 years making and selling blinds under their belt, not only is this vertical blind made by the experts, it also comes with a fabulous five year guarantee - extra assurance that you are investing in quality that will stand the test of time.
